title: Research advanced search tools integration
description:
Research and design advanced search capabilities beyond bash execution.

Current state:
- Consoul only has bash_execute for searching (grep, find, etc.)
- No semantic or specialized search tools

Proposed features from cursor-agent:
1. Codebase semantic search - Understand code semantically
2. File search - Fuzzy file finding by name
3. Grep search - Structured regex-based search
4. Web search - Google Search API integration
5. Trend search - Search for trending topics

Research tasks:
1. Review cursor-agent's search_tools.py implementation
2. Evaluate semantic search libraries (tree-sitter, ast-grep)
3. Design tool APIs that work with LangChain
4. Research Google Search API requirements and costs
5. Consider caching and performance implications
6. Determine risk levels for each tool type
7. Plan integration with ToolRegistry

Success criteria:
- Document each search tool type and use cases
- Evaluate semantic search library options
- Create API design for each tool
- Estimate API costs
- Security/permission analysis
- Implementation roadmap

References:
- cursor-agent search_tools.py
- Consoul ToolRegistry: src/consoul/ai/tools/registry.py
